basic_info.description: As a current graphic design student, I am visually, and introspectively learning through different experiences. I aspire to become a UX Designer as I seek to curate a visual experience, bridging the connection between creativity and technology. I am actively, curiously learning, and exploring through different experiences to broaden my knowledge of design, and social media content creation. And I am a huge foodie, especially for a good bowl of ramen!

projects.title: Frog-Leap
projects.description: This project covers what, how, and why can we enhance a user experience on campus. Working with a team, we decided to create a campus shuttle experience for college students. The shuttle can provide easy accessibility for transportation around two miles radius. Inspired by the Uber app, I, as the designer of the group create an imaginary mobile platform on an existing campus map app for students to access FrogLeap. Here, students can navigate through the instructions and schedule their desired time and date for the shuttle to arrive. Calculating the GPS location, the shuttle will estimate the wait time and give students the closest stop to their arrival location..

projects.title: Photography
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. I was responsible for testing photography application that optimizes images with popular algorithms used by graphic editors like Pixlr or Adobe Photoshop. I've earned A grade :)

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
